scripts.docker:run-windows: docker run -p 7878:3000 -v %CD%/public/reports:/usr/src/app/public/reports -v %CD%/database:/usr/src/app/database -v %CD%/logs:/usr/src/app/logs -d --name hostel-attendance-app hostel-attendance-app && npm run docker:logs
scripts.docker:run-linux: docker run -p 7878:3000 -v $pwd/public/reports:/usr/src/app/public/reports -v $pwd/database:/usr/src/app/database -v $pwd/logs:/usr/src/app/logs -d --name hostel-attendance-app hostel-attendance-app && npm run docker:logs
scripts.docker:start: docker start hostel-attendance-app && npm run docker:logs
scripts.deploy-windows: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:run-windows
scripts.deploy-linux: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:run-linux
